articles.author: KIM CHANDLER Associated Press
articles.title: Investigator says teen admitted shooting sheriff
articles.description: A state investigator testified that a teenager admitted to shooting an Alabama sheriff who was attempting to disperse loiterers at a gas station
articles.content:
HAYNEVILLE. Ala. -- 
A teenager admitted to fatally shooting an Alabama sheriff who was attempting to disperse loiterers at a gas station, a state investigator testified Monday.
Lt. Shawn Loughridge of the State Bureau of Investigation testified in a prelim… [+1794 chars]

articles.author: CATHY BUSSEWITZ AP Business Writer
articles.title: Lyft's good-guy image tainted by sexual assault lawsuits
articles.description: For years, Lyft has been the good guy of ride-hailing
articles.content:
NEW YORK -- 
For years , Lyft has been the good guy of ride-hailing. In early days, its cars were adorned with whimsical pink mustaches. Its founders talked about improving peoples lives by reducing individual car ownership. And while Uber drivers grabbed he… [+7578 chars]
